mapper.select: SELECT S.STADIUM_NAME AS stadiumName, S.STADIUM_ADDRESS AS stadiumAddress, S.STADIUM_CATEGORY AS category, M.MEM_NAME AS referee FROM STADIUM S JOIN MEMBER M ON M.MEM_NO = S.MEM_NO WHERE STADIUM_NO = #{stadiumNo}

SELECT TEAM_NAME AS opponent, CONCAT( COUNT(*) , '전 ', CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN M.SCORE_A > M.SCORE_B THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN CONCAT(COUNT(CASE WHEN M.SCORE_A > M.SCORE_B THEN 1 END), '승') ELSE '' END, ' ', CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN M.SCORE_A = M.SCORE_B THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN CONCAT(COUNT(CASE WHEN M.SCORE_A = M.SCORE_B THEN 1 END), '무') ELSE '' END, ' ', CASE WHEN COUNT(CASE WHEN M.SCORE_A < M.SCORE_B THEN 1 END) > 0 THEN CONCAT(COUNT(CASE WHEN M.SCORE_A < M.SCORE_B THEN 1 END), '패') ELSE '' END ) AS result FROM TEAM WHERE TEAM_NO = #{teamANo}
